column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Now onto the lifestyle amenities. Art Institute of Chicago offers visitors a great place to relax
column2: excellent cafes and great places to lounge around and rest. The cafe food is of high quality and reasonable prices. It is served in a modern and airy environment. There is a nice lounge with special seating for the extra special members. The courtyard is beautiful and romantic. On the Thursday that we went
column3: there was live jazz music and fine quality appetizers and drinks to snack on....what a romantic place for a date.
